name: A Pilot Light Left In A Forest...
name_original: A Pilot Light Left In A Forest...
description:
There's an open flame in a forest... yikes.

Yeah geez, that's really irresponsible... to just leave a pilot light on... right there with all that dry wood around. I mean and making into a game? C'mon, you're basically encouraging this reckless treatment of camping equipment... just unacceptable... really.

*Click* *Click* with your mouse to play...
